name: SMLWaterUpdate
0:
”Alexa, open s. m. l. water update”
”Alexa, start s. m. l. water update”
”Alexa, launch s. m. l. water update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: s. m. l. water update
des: This skill provides the latest Smith Mountain Lake water level (in inches below full pond), current water status (rising or falling in inches per hour), and current water temperature.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
